2.2.0 Trial-Implementation 
- Trial-Implementation release with resolved public comment (bug fixed)
title: Non-patient File Sharing (NPFS)
introduction: This profile defines how to enable the sharing of non-patient files. Those files can be created, consumed and updated by many different systems involved in a wide variety of data sharing workflows (clinical workflow definition, domain policies sharing, stylesheets management, etc.). This profile identifies three actors: File Manager, File Consumer, and File Source.
